column4: Whats a good player for dvds?
vlc closes soon as it starts to load dvd
yes and mplayer crashed very hard
I believe you will have to disable the desktop effects.
do you have the desktop effects enabled?
where would I find that out?
that probably means no. but to be sure go to system -> preferences -> apperence
when the window opens, go to the tab on far right "visual effects"
ok, try none....sucks but the visual effects take up resourse
lol no thanks I like my desktop looking good, ill just rip the vid to iso then watch it then delete it.
though it might be easer to turn off the effects, watch the movie, then turn the effects back on.
ok I am running out of ideas then..lol
